item.title: CVE-2023-5552|2024-09-13T16:21:10.363Z -- sophos -- sophos%20firewall
item.description: A password disclosure vulnerability in the Secure PDF eXchange (SPX) feature allows attackers with full email access to decrypt PDFs in Sophos Firewall version 19.5 MR3 (19.5.3) and older, if the password type is set to “Specified by sender”.
